topic.title: Black Substance... Prior Dream
topic.body: Is the BS where "dream state" beginning? Is the life/dead God? ...perhaps it is the "water" that is born in the "tailbone" that is the root to ascend through the 33 floors of the Earth's dimension and feed the Ferrita diamond hidden in the center of ourselves, under all those aranned layers. It is perhaps the BS Cerebrospinal Liquid that after passing through the 4 seasons of time, dies, to give life to the best holographic "reality" projected by the pineal gland ...blood.
